predictions <- predict(model1_lm, newdata = test_data) # Generate predictions
actuals <- test_data$price # Compare predictions with actual values

# evaluation metrics
library(Metrics)
rmse_value <- rmse(actuals, predictions)
mae_value <- mae(actuals, predictions)
r2_value <- cor(actuals, predictions)^2
cat("RMSE:", rmse_value, "\n")
